summary: The Protect Elections from Deceptive AI Act aims to prevent the distribution of AI-generated audio or visual media used to deceive voters about candidates for federal office. It prohibits the knowing distribution of materially deceptive AI-generated content intended to influence or solicit funds in an election, with exceptions for news broadcasts, publications, and satire/parody. The bill allows covered individuals to seek injunctive relief and damages and considers violations defamation per se. The plaintiff bears the burden of proof.
